title: Interior Minister launches Automated Fire Safety Compliance System to enhance public safety
desc: The Minister for the Interior, Mohammed Muntaka-Mubarak, has launched the Automated Fire Safety Compliance System (AFCAS), a new digital platform designed to transform fire safety compliance in Ghana.
